root.name: Loadout
root.description: OverviewLoadout is a humorously stylised, over the top, competitive multiplayer shooter, focusing on Weaponcrafting, class customisations and its cartoony art style aesthetics. System RequirementsOS:Windows XP SP3, Windows 7, Windows 8Processor:Core 2 Duo or betterMemory:2GB or betterGraphics:Pixel Shader 3.0 compliant video card with 512MB VRAM (Intel HD3000 or better)DirectXÂ®:9.0cHard Drive:4GB HD spaceOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
